event.title: Bristol Machine Learning #5
event.description:
Welcome to Bristol Machine Learning's second proper meet-up! This time hosted by Candide - https://candidegardening.com/

Talks:

- "CoreML for the masses" - George Bafaloukas, R&D at Dyson
- "What is AI?" - Iain Wallace, CTO, Rovco

Schedule:

19:00 Doors, Food & Drink
19:30ish Talks
20:30ish Tidy up & Head to a local pub to continue the conversation

We also now have a Twitter account: https://twitter.com/bristol_ml Please follow us!

As always we welcome new speakers. Please don't hesitate to message any of the organisers if you have a talk idea.
